abstract: Members of the Amazon Prime subscription program will be able to read the e-books free through a lending library that is intended to encourage consumers to buy Kindle devices.
snippet: Members of the Amazon Prime subscription program will be able to read the e-books free through a lending library that is intended to encourage consumers to buy Kindle devices.
lead_paragraph: An Amazon.com program that allows Kindle owners to read e-books free has just made a high-profile addition: the “Harry Potter” series.

headline.main: Amazon Program Offers ‘Harry Potter’ Series to Kindle Owners
